[`Workspace`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace.md) â€º [`getActiveFile`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/getActiveFile.md)

## Workspace.getActiveFile() method

Returns the file for the current view if it's a `FileView`<!-- -->. Otherwise, it will return the most recently active file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getActiveFile(): TFile | null;
```
**Returns:**

[`TFile`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/TFile.md)` | null`
